pageTitle: BioShock 2 - PCGamingWiki PCGW - bugs, fixes, crashes, mods, guides and improvements for every PC game
textBeforeTable: In-game key map settings. In-game control settings. Input settings[edit] There is no native AO support in BioShock 2. AO can be forcibly enabled, however, through your graphics driver's control panel. Please consult the user guide for your particular graphics driver on how this is performed. For Nvidia cards you can force HDAO+ (denominated High quality) in DX9 Mode via Nvidia inspector with the AO bit - 0x0002002D - [4] Example what inspector should look like Ambient Occlusion (AO)[edit] There is no native AA support in BioShock 2. AA can be forcibly enabled, however, through your graphics driver's control panel. Please consult the user guide for your particular graphics driver on how this is performed. For Nvidia cards you can force SGSSAA (2x-8x) in DX9 Mode via Nvidia inspector with the AA bit - 0x000010C1 - [3]
